category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: METimeDecimalPlaces
preference.preference_description: Defines the number of decimal places displayed for time properties. Valid values are -1, 0, ..., 6, where -1 represents all significant places. This preference should be set using the Manufacturing Options Time panel to take effect without restarting Teamcenter. The default value for this preference is 2.
